website_summaries.verdict: This is perfect for those who are looking for a looser UV protection shirt, but it may be too thick for use on really hot days.
pros: Offers a relaxed fit that doesn't cling to your skin
cons: Users say the fabric is a little too thick for use on really hot and humid days

customer_reviews.title: Not Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on other reviews that it was comfortable in hot weather. I must disagree. I wore it on a mid- to upper eighty degree day, with relatively high humidity, the day started out cloudy and ended sunny. My activity level range from mild to moderate. I immediately wished I had gone with a different shirt. It is thicker than many of my sleeve t-shirt and heavier. I'm pretty heat tolerant to begin with, most people complain about the heat long before I'm uncomfortable. So, I think that says something. The shirt is generously cut, no need worrying about sizing up. My search for long sleeve summer t-shirts will continue.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: no more sticky sunscreen or burning skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for use translucent folks who even sunscreen can't protect (although I do have to admit that not having to rub it everywhere was also great when wearing this shirt!). It's true to size only more of a loose fit versus s swim shirt that would have a little compression. This protected my skin and was relatively cool (it is a long sleeve shirt after all). I do think it's a bit pricey, but does what it says it will. I wear a size 16-18 and purchased an XL.
customer_reviews.author: LemonButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sun shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt! I got the navy in small in it's a nice dark navy. It fits somewhat loosely (it's supposed to - to keep you cool), but still true to size. If you're looking for something tight, order a size down. It's flowy and comfortable without looking sloppy. And it's surprisingly cool to the touch! The only (very minor) thing that I don't like about it is that it takes a bit longer to dry (if you're hang-drying it) than most of my other tech-y shirts, which is only really an issue if you're hand-washing laundry while traveling. All around, it's a great shirt!
customer_reviews.author: randomtuesday

customer_reviews.title: Great, but might run a little big.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shirt quite a bit. I work in a restaurant that can get pretty hot, but I didn't just want to wear the t-shirt they gave us. It allows me to stay cool in these warming months. The quality seems to be good and I look forward to wearing it as much as possible. The only ding is that a medium ran a little large for me. I am 5'8 and weigh 125 pounds. That being said, I am getting another one as soon as I can afford it. Wish it had more of a crew neck, but that is just me.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I really like Coolibar shirts, both for me and my guy. They last a long time, are very durable and I love the sun coverage. However, I've noticed that Coolibar clothes run small for women while my guy just orders his size and it fits. Having read that this shirt came small, I ordered a size up and it kinda fits. I'm 5'2", 120 pounds, and the sleeves are too long. But my shoulders and bust just fit in this shirt, any smaller would be too small. I guess the sleeves will help protect my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Conda V. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Not for petites...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a TTS XS in tops like this so that’s what I ordered. Also to note, I’m petite. The XS is HUGE on me. Not so much width, but length. The sleeves could have gone past my fingertips and covered them... the body length went past my butt. I’m 5’2” with a longer torso. I’m not THAT short. But their sizing is definitely made for TALL people, and that’s not cool. WE NEED PETITE SIZES!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiena T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Except for the giant neck hole in the 2XL.😭
customer_reviews.text: The material has a soft cotton feel so its cooler and more comfortable than other UPF shirts. The arms are comfortably long on my 5'10" frame. This would the perfect sun protection shirt if not for the outrageously large neck opening. Based on the picture vs what I got I think that, like many clothing companies, they just upped the measurements in the larger sizes. The 2XL opening is a good 3 inches on either side of my neck. Way more acreage than any neck gaiter can cover.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Reading

customer_reviews.title: Nice in the sun shirt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a day at SeaWorld to protect myself against the sun. The weather was in the high 80's in San Diego and I was still comfortable in a long sleeve shirt and no sun tan lines. Like others who commented on the sleeves, they are long I am 5'5" and the sleeves had to be rolled over twice to fit. The price is a bit high at $45 but I bought a Versa at almost half price and will try that next, it does not seem to be as nice as the Coolibar.
customer_reviews.author: California housewife

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cool, comfortable sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other shirts with sun protection and they are too hot. This shirt is soft and cool, even in direct sun. The sizing is true to size. I did not notice any shrinkage after washing two times. I am 5'9" and usually order a tall if available. The sleeve length on this shirt was just fine. I loved it so much that I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Born to Travel

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" and smallish in size. I purchased the small. It fit well but was a bit long. After washing it seems to have shrunk up a bit in length and still fits well it so seems this was the correct size for me. I purchased it in grey. The only reason for the 4 stars and not 5 is the price. I would have bought a couple more if they were not as expensive :(
customer_reviews.author: Garden S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot weather
customer_reviews.text: I am on a medication that causes sun sensitivity and I needed something to wear to football games. This shirt was perfect. I never felt overheated and was well protected from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy R. Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this shirt whenever I go outside. I bought it in white and aquarius heather. I live in the desert and it is extremely hot and the sun is intense. The fabric is soft, smooth and very sturdy. I have washed it 4 times and it seems to hold up very well. I gave it 4 stars because I am 5' and 100 lbs. It is too long in length as well as long in the sleeves. I loved it so much that it was worth having it altered.
customer_reviews.author: Desert dweller

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt with great protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt to wear and protect you from the sun's UV rays. I normally wear a medium, but have this in large so it is not snug. Long enough to cover your back. Lightweight, and keeps your body cool as well. Great shirt to wear for protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Larschan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and protects. . .
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida, it is hot and humid for a very long time. I love this fabric which is light weight, wicks and protects from the UV rays and it fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shirt to wear to the beach. It was great. It with stood many hours in the surf and when I washed it looked brand new again. Most important no sunburn!!! I purchased one size larger than I normally wear since I was going to wear over swim suit and it was just about right. Check the Coolibar size chart if you are busty you may need a larger size than you expect unless you like your shirts form fitted. I live in Florida so UPF 50+ is a great help in preventing skin cancers.
customer_reviews.author: Child of God

customer_reviews.title: It is not snug and has just enough space to feel comfortable. The sleeves come almost to my hands
customer_reviews.text: The shirt fits me just right. I am a 5 9' woman who wears an American size 10. The medium fits me perfectly. It is not snug and has just enough space to feel comfortable. The sleeves come almost to my hands. I wore the shirt outside in the hot sun and felt very comfortable and I live in Florida. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mezzogirl

customer_reviews.title: I got the long sleeve wrap and that seemed like enough, and more flexible
customer_reviews.text: Fit ok, feels soft, but I decided it would be too hot to wear in the Caribbean tropics. I got the long sleeve wrap and that seemed like enough, and more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: NDM

customer_reviews.title: Nice material & great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Soft material, breathes better than nylon sunshirts when it's hot out. I use it gardening, hiking, & mowing. Doesn't let the sun through, and the fit looks nice. I usually wear Large size, occasionally a Medium, I brought the Large and it was perfect. Have bought 2 in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: MM.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. I'm 5'5" and 160 lbs and the large is perfect. I like the light weight fabric and use this top when I'm on a construction site in California - no burning, not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: KBkat

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer sun.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well if you're fair skinned and trying to avoid getting sunburned. It will also keep you cool if you get it wet. It's a bit see through so you have to wear something under it .
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like it for comfort but not for warm weather. I play tennis year round in Florida and was looking for sun protection but also stay cool. This is very comfy and I wear it on cooler evenings. I also found it wrinkles really easily
customer_reviews.author: outtolunch

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and function but warm
customer_reviews.text: Size XS - This is a nice shirt and fits well - certainly worth the price given the sunscreen. The only negative would be that it is not very cool in hot weather. Will wear it more when it cools down.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: Nice top
customer_reviews.text: This ticks all the boxes fits as expected washed up great goes well with everything. The fabric feels soft and holds it shape. I bought several of these now can’t go wrong works great protecting me from sunlight and it’s effect on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer exercise shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. It protects from the hot sun so I don't have to use so much sun lotion, and is comfortable walking, hiking or running in the hot, muggy Virginia summer. I highly recommend it as it's SO comfortable. I bought one and liked it so much I ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: christine murray

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one size up for freedom of movement. We snorkel in Cozemel at noon. Protected me well, was comfortable and dried in time to repack the next day. I would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shirts
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is great. It's attractive and breathable. I wear it quite often in the summer when I might be in the sun a lot. The fabric is awesome. It's also not see-through like most white shirts are!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Overall, not really what I am looking for - ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, not really what I am looking for - something for hot, humid golf. A bit too clingy and sleeves are a bit long. Just not the right shirt for me.
customer_reviews.author: birdiebabe

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fabric. Can dress up or wear with Jean's and a scarf
customer_reviews.author: Suedy

customer_reviews.title: It's been a great shirt
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shirt that wasn't heavy to protect my skin from the sun on a trip to Utah where it can get very hot. This shirt worked out fine. Hmmm this may have been an older review that I wrote before. Purchased another one as the old one has gotten a good workout camping.
customer_reviews.author: ChatKat

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally nice shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! Easy care, fits nicely, and will be comfortable-plus sun proof. Who could ask for more? Just buy it in another color!
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: "A" for sun protection, "F" for breathability and quick drying features
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" and 135 lbs and bought the medium based upon reviews. I would have preferred a small but was hiking in Laguna and didn't have time to exchange. The shirt did provide sun protection. However, the fabric was not at all quick drying, it got wet and felt heavy, hot and uncomfortable. I would not recommend if you are working out and sweat even the littlest bit.
customer_reviews.author: Make-Time-To-Travel

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Report of sizing was inaccurate. Would need to be 50 pounds heavier and 6 inches broader in the sholder to make use of the product. I should have returned it immediately
customer_reviews.author: Happy reader

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Despite 6 mile walk in 85 Degree sun!
customer_reviews.text: Wore it to walk 6 miles in the hot Hawaiian sun... and I was actually 'cooled' by the 'evaporation effect that I felt. Of course it totally blocked the sun too... no burn! AND although I got tinted sunscreen on it (white) it washed right out. Loving this shirt...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to stop the suns burning rays
customer_reviews.text: I like that the shirt seems to be the same quality as the one I purchased years ago. With the heat and harshness of the sun, lately, the shirt seems to be keeping my arms cooler than a non sun shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep my arms covered at all times and this shirt offers me perfect protection from all damaging sun rays. My only complaints that it's a little too big, but the medium is too small. I want to get more colors so I can wear them under big comfortable long sleeveless tops. I'm hesitating only because of the extra fabric that makes it a little less fitted. I'll probably get more because they are terrific protection and I don't have to wear a protective jacket all the time.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful. The fabric feels nice-not too thin or too ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. The fabric feels nice-not too thin or too heavy. I am 5’4 and ordered a size Large. My bust is 41 inches and waist is 34. The Large fit perfectly with enough room to move and not feel clingy. The sleeves were a touch too long but all in all, it’s a great top!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Z.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and a perfect fit. I like the scalloped hem on the sides. Perfect to wear for gardening outdoors. I got 2 white ones!
customer_reviews.author: Nechan

customer_reviews.title: Great top
customer_reviews.text: Fits great light weight. Can't go wrong buying this top if you want to block the sin and not be hot with long sleeves!!!
customer_reviews.author: CBK

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I probably have five of these shirt. I wear them in the summer and it's chilly add a button shirt on top. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Lady Reads

customer_reviews.title: Sun safety the easy way
customer_reviews.text: Great alone or under a T-shirt. I wear these at the beach while looking for shells, or if Im going to be outside all day. Soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chela

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shirt. Very comfortable and stretchy so it works great for a workout shirt. Fits well too.
customer_reviews.author: DogLuvr36

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I like that the shirt provides protection from the sun. I have one just like it in another color. Nice to have 2 shirts in different colors. Even in the Texas heat, I do not get too hot wearing this long sleeve shirt.
customer_reviews.author: HEA

customer_reviews.title: Coolbar Women's Morada Everyday long sleeved tee
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several sun protection jerseys and I like the Coolbar Women's Morada Everyday long sleeve-tee the best. The others ordered were too clingy and for the very slim in size. I wish this sun protected jersey came in petite and relaxed sizes.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality fabric and well crafted. I'm normally a medium and bought the medium and it's a nice loose fit and sleeve length is just perfect. Going to buy another color. I live in Florida and have to walk my dog rain or shine. This is perfect fit those hot, humid days when he's got to go out.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudyLA

customer_reviews.title: This shirt fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and ease of packing this shirt. It fit great. The length was perfect. The sleeves were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shirt
customer_reviews.text: the shirt is great on 70 degree or less days. On really hot days I am uncomfortable with having long sleeves. I prefer sunscreen and short sleeves on hot days biking, playing golf, etc. The shirt feels good, soft, washes great, good length. It's a great all around super shirt.
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fabric and fits perfect and so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fabric and fits perfect and so comfortable. The white is not see through. Ordered a blue one too.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Good value - sized well - good option
customer_reviews.text: Great value - protected me well when I had to be in the sun and taking an antibiotic at the same time. I am 117 llbs and ordered the smallest size in the grey. It was good choice as the color held up well to summer activities but was not too dark to look out of season.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Soft,
customer_reviews.text: As I have not yet worn this item I only give a 4 star rating but the fabric is wonderful and soft, it fits well and I strongly suspect I will wear this on a regular basis. As a matter of fact I also bought a pair of beach pants and have decided to wear shirt and pants to travel in on my long flight to Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Vigneau

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid I wouldn’t like the feel of the material but it is super soft like a T-Shirt. I am also 6 months pregnant and bought this to wear in Hawaii and it fits great and I will fit me post partum. I am also a weightlifter and typically have issues with shirts being too tight in my arms, not the case with this shirt. Love it and look forward to buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ward M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: See Thru White
customer_reviews.text: You can easily see thru the WHITE material. The other colors are fine and youcaanot see thru them.
customer_reviews.author: Jones Best Buys

customer_reviews.title: Needed something to wear out in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I love the material on these shirts. They are soft and I am very sure these are what I am looking for to wear on hotter days because of my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Robb

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice normal fabric. Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt actually feels and looks like a normal T-shirt (not polyester like the other stuff). Looks nice and not utilitarian.
customer_reviews.author: Dookie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can see dark items underneath but otherwise a great shirt, perfect for paddle boarding.
customer_reviews.author: ittybittycutiekitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection
customer_reviews.text: Great for covering my skin in the blistering sun. Pleasantly surprised that I stayed cool and the top is attractive even during a heavy workout. I ordered other colors. It runs a tad large, so I ordered a size smaller so that it still fits well when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Diann

customer_reviews.title: ... wore this shirt in the desert and felt completely comfortable. No sunburn but I'm not sure if that's ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shirt in the desert and felt completely comfortable. No sunburn but I'm not sure if that's a particularly special thing when it comes to long sleeve shirts. I'm fair-skinned and I can't remember ever getting sunburned under a shirt. This shirt kept me cool though. I was definitely not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B Leech

customer_reviews.title: How ever created this material is a genius!!
customer_reviews.text: love it. Is not hot and I live in NC. Humidity doesn't bother me yet my skin is protected and I have skin cancer. Can say enough good things about it. I wear a ten but like the larger fit for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Tallone

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: cool to wear and fit is great. My favorite SPF shirt
customer_reviews.author: lacewing

customer_reviews.title: SEE THROUGH!
customer_reviews.text: It’s REALLY see through! I was searching for a white long-sleeve tee that was t.
customer_reviews.author: M. Joann Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable, all the while protecting me from the sun
customer_reviews.text: I love these Coolibar shirts and I now have 4 of them, all long sleeved. They are easily wearable and not too hot in the heat of summer, or can be worn as a first layer of clothing for a cool winter hike. The fabric is thin and flexible, so they can be hung up for a quick dry which makes them ideal for traveling. An added benefit is that they are protecting me from the sun @ the same time. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Birchles

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy good coverage
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable even in 90 degree heat. The blue is very pretty.Great coverage. I would have given 5 stars but.... it runs big/long.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for hot weather
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit, but the material feels too heavy to wear on hot days. I bought it to play tennis in the summer and it is just too hot for me to wear. I wish the material were a lot thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Very comfortable when playing golf. Will buy the black one next.
customer_reviews.author: merle

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is soft and comfortable and protects me from the sun. I am 5'1" 115 lb. The sleeves are a little long, but I like that (more coverage). Unfortunately the neck is a little large. It looks fine, but when I wear my gator with it there are gaps where my skin is exposed, so it is not completely functional for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the beach trip. Fits great and so soft.
customer_reviews.author: jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Really useful for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I am fair skinned and middle aged and I don't want to get a lot of sun on my arms, chest or back. This shirt was fabulous for my two weeks stay at the beach last summer and I plan on getting more of these items for this coming summer. The coverage on this shirt is excellent - long sleeves/high neck. It's also quick dry.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these items were ordered for my wife and recommended by her dermatologist. She is happy so everybody is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt, nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt, nice fabric. Would be better for a taller person. I am 5"1" and sleeves and body are too long for me, but it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run large
customer_reviews.text: I am a medium for tops but the medium coolibar was way too big and loose. Just keep this in mind when you select the size you want. Otherwise the shirt seems to be of good quality. I'm going to re-order the small and see if it will fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The are great shirts and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: When only the best UV clothes will do, go get a coolibar
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eads

customer_reviews.title: Great SPF and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great spf long sleeve shirt. Nothing fancy, but very comfortable fabric and I like the length of the sleeves. I wear it outside all day long at the lake and no burning or sun issues.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: She loves it so I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: She ordinarily wears a 12 or US large. The large fits but is a bit tight on the bust she is 38 DD. But the XL probably would have been to big. She loves the shirt, keeps the sun off without burning her up.
customer_reviews.author: EJR123

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, but not fun to wear in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, but not fun to wear in the sun. I started to get dizzy from overheating. When I wore it over my swimsuit in the ocean though, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Coolibar prodcuts are great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy but the sleeves are too long. I find that with all my long sleeve t-shirts so I was not surprised. Very easy to roll them up so that is not a problem. Washed and dried easily. Dryer did not shrink it. All in all I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: KonnieKay

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks when washed
customer_reviews.text: Shrunk after washed it just once. Dried on low but the length and size shrunk.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: I love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. It is very soft, and was very comfortable to wear. I would definitely purchase it again, and it fit perfectly based on the numbers in the sizing chart.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I especially liked the light material.I walk in the morning and it’s perfect for my walks.Its sun protection and cool. It feels great. I highly recommend this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  I'd wear nothing but these shirts if I could afford it.
customer_reviews.text: love the fabric feels very cool even in AZ sun. Very comfortable. I got a medium which is a little large, but I like it. Later, I might try getting a small also.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Eases nice and does the job without being too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Mahoney-Daly

customer_reviews.title: It is a good fit. I went be the size chart that ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good fit. I went be the size chart that was shown and got the right size. It is light weight and the material is soft and nice. I have already washed it and it did well.
customer_reviews.author: Catwoman

customer_reviews.title: Sun Protection that works.
customer_reviews.text: i wear these sailing, kayaking and paddleboarding. they do a great job of sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilee

customer_reviews.title: does not breathe
customer_reviews.text: The shirt does not breathe, it was very hot and became heavy while walking on a warm, humid day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable - looks good, too. Breathed well on the 95 degree I wore it out.
customer_reviews.author: MSCKaren

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased. Used it at the beach on a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased. Used it at the beach on a very hot day and it was just what I needed .
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I like the styling of the neckline
customer_reviews.text: Holds it shape and fit after washing. Very comfortable. I like the styling of the neckline. More feminine than a crewneck.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: great shirt
customer_reviews.text: the fit of this sun protection shirt is good (loose), the fabric feels nice, I would like some additional light colors
customer_reviews.author: Debby Childs

customer_reviews.title: I am sure it does the job but I don't like the feel of the material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shirt in Large and the TASC shirt in Large to compare how they feel since I am new at wearing UPF clothing. This shirt is thicker, seems a little heavier, and is a little clingy compared to the TASC shirt, which is a little more lightweight and less clingy. I sent this one back.
customer_reviews.author: DVG

customer_reviews.title: and I am very pleased. Very comfortable and look forward to wearing when ...
customer_reviews.text: First Coolbar item I have ordered.and I am very pleased. Very comfortable and look forward to wearing when we finally get some sun. Oregon has had rain, rain and more rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable coverup to prevent sunburn, even when it was very hot outside. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cahilly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those sensitive to heat
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt so much I bought a second in yellow! I have ms & am sensitive to heat. The shirts allow me to stay comfy regardless of the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi W.

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I like the fabric but the shirt is too large
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good material, and a good fit. It was very pricey!!
customer_reviews.author: Jfog

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Breathable, Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fits as expected, breathes relatively well and made my midday bike commute in Honolulu, Hawaii much more comfortable. I just wish they had my size in more colors- I would by more. Although white probably makes for best heat reflection also.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Love the stretchy material!
customer_reviews.text: Great material and fit! I wear a S/M depending on the fit and the small was perfect. Even a little roomy. The blue is a fantastic color too!
customer_reviews.author: ArizonaPatti16

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to buy more Coolibar products
customer_reviews.text: The material the color and the feel and the sun protection it gives are some of the things I love about this product
customer_reviews.author: Beth Hart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt kept me cool during our Caribbean vacation. It was extremely comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: teachpeach

customer_reviews.title: Great T-Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this coolbar shirt. It was very comfortable to wear in warm weather, when I'm outside all day, and I don't want to have to reapply sunscreen very few hours. I also washed it out and it dripped dry overnight. It was very cool and comfortable. I'd like to buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt-long sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. The sleeves are a little long. The shirt is more cool than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ac64

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit well and hate the material. Does not cool as indicated.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable , soft, and is good for hot or cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: AL

product_meta.title: Coolibar UPF 50+ Women's Morada Everyday Long Sleeve T-Shirt - Sun Protective
feature_bullets: ZnO™ fabric: Super soft against the skin, lightweight, cool and comfortable with the highest quality zinc oxide protection
Flattering feminine cut; Body length 25 inches (size medium); Authentic t-shirt will have Coolibar logo on wearer's left sleeve and tagless Coolibar tag on inside neck
Easy care: machine wash, tumble dry; Imported
Recommended for everyday leisure, around the patio, around town or just hanging around, walking the dog, gardening or light yard work
